thread.section_title: Hotel Audran - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value for money
thread.title_full: Great value for money - Review of Hotel Audran, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lprince1
title: Great value for money
text: Stayed for two nights. The hotel is basic but clean and the staff are welcoming and helpful. The breakfast was good value at 6 euros. The hotel was a little noisy but then you are in a city. The area is great. The Abbesse metro is just metres away and it's a short walk (up a steep hill) to the Sacre Coeur. The area was busy but friendly with small boutique shops, supermarkets and lots of bars and restaurants. Would recommend for short stay in Paris. Photo is view from the Sacre Coeur.
